programme.title: Mine
programme.desc: Thriller with Armie Hammer. After a failed assassination attempt, a soldier finds himself stranded in the desert. Exposed to the elements, he must survive the dangers of the desert and battle the psychological and physical toll of the treacherous conditions

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: Sci-Fi with Chris Pine and Zachary Quinto. The USS Enterprise crew explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a mysterious new enemy who puts them and everything the Federation stands for to the test

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: A story inspired by "The Canterbury Tales" starring Heath Ledger. When his master dies, a young squire with a gift for jousting hits the road with his two cohorts to prove himself a worthy knight

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. Comedy with Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Alan Rickman, Tony Shalhoub and Sam Rockwell

programme.title: Cyber Case
programme.desc: Thriller. A young woman uses geotagged pictures to help rescue her kidnapped brother

programme.title: Sometimes The Good Kill
programme.desc: Crime drama. After a mysterious death at the Abbey, Sister Talia finds herself caught in the center of the internal investigation. Under orders from the newly elected Mother Superior, she must uncover the truth behind the death before the killer strikes again

programme.title: Gates Of The Sun
programme.desc: Action. An Algerian secret agent has to destroy an undercover paramilitary organisation that plans to strike the country and its people

programme.title: Biker Boyz
programme.desc: High-octane drama starring Laurence Fishburne as Smoke unbeaten 'King of Cali' motorcycle racing. When Smoke's ace mechanic is killed by a flying bike, his furious son starts his own club to challenge Smoke

programme.title: Don't Kill It
programme.desc: Action starring Dolph Lundgren and Kristina Klebe. Demon hunter, Jebediah Huntley teams up with an FBI agent to battle a supernatural force in the southern state of Mississippi

programme.title: The Drowning
programme.desc: Drama and Thriller starring Julia Stiles and Josh Charles. A psychiatrist faces his past, present and future when he finds himself involved in the treatment of a young man recently released from prison for a murder committed when the boy was just 11 years old

programme.title: Enter The Warrior's Gate
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure meets martial arts action. A teenage gamer is transported to a fantasy world, where he is mistaken for his video-game alter ego, a legendary hero. Soon, he sets out to rescue a kidnapped princess from the clutches of a cruel warlord

programme.title: The Osiris Child
programme.desc: Action and adventure starring Kellan Lutz and Daniel Macpherson. Set in the future in a time of interplanetary colonization, an unlikely pair race against an impending global crisis and are confronted by the monsters that live inside us all

programme.title: The Pastor
programme.desc: Action starring Franky G and Ismael Cruz Cordova. An imprisoned former gang leader discovers his faith in God while in solitary confinement. When he comes out, he becomes a Pastor and is committed to protecting the youth in his gang infested Hispanic community

programme.title: Renegades
programme.desc: Action with J.K. Simmons. In the war-torn Bosnian capital of Sarajevo, US Navy Seal Matt Barnes leads a band of renegades on a covert operation to rescue treasure from the bottom of a lake

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Crime. A psychopathic Japanese executive accidentally triggers a journalist's dark side and they begin to form a strange bond over the Internet

programme.title: Gun Shy
programme.desc: Action. Turk Henry (Antonio Banderas), a rock star, takes his wife (Olga Kurylenko) on a luxury holiday only for her to be abducted by a group of renegade, ship-less pirates. Turk is forced to embark on a rescue mission through the deadly jungles of South America

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Peter Paul and David Paul. Identical twin brothers on both sides of the law - one's a cop, the other is a criminal - work together when an unrepentant villain tries to frame them for murder as he tries to get his hands on a huge stash of diamonds

programme.title: Six Gun Savior
programme.desc: Action with Eric Roberts. Injured after confront the outlaw who murdered their family Lane McCrae, a cowboy, sells his soul to the Devil in a pact to save his dying brother. But the Devil is not known for keeping his word, making him a bounty hunter for hell

programme.title: Shut In
programme.desc: A heart-pounding thriller with Naomi Watts and Oliver Platt about a widowed child psychologist who lives in an isolated existence in rural New England. Caught in a deadly winter storm, she must find a way to rescue a young boy before he disappears forever

programme.title: Gridlocked
programme.desc: Action with Dominic Purcell and Cody Hackman. Former SWAT leader David Hendrix and hard-partying movie star Brody Walker must cut their ride-along short when a police training facility is attacked by a team of mercenaries

programme.title: Patient Zero
programme.desc: Horror and action. After an unprecedented global pandemic turns the majority of humankind into violent "Infected," a man gifted with the ability to speak the Infected's new language leads the last survivors on a hunt for Patient Zero and a cure

programme.title: Six Days Seven Nights
programme.desc: Romantic adventure starring Harrison Ford and Anne Heche. A gruff pilot and a New York magazine editor must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island

programme.title: RV
programme.desc: An overworked executive Bob Munro persuades his wife and children to give up their Hawaiian vacation for some 'family bonding' on a cross-country RV trip. Family adventure starring Robin Williams

programme.title: Beautiful Beast
programme.desc: Romance. A twist on the classic Beauty and the Beast tale. When Isabelle, a beauty only on the outside, becomes lost in the wilderness, she stumbles upon Jeremy, a man hiding from his past. Will Isabelle revert to the beast and give up her chance at real love?

programme.title: Akeelah And The Bee
programme.desc: A young girl has a talent for spelling, which leads her all the way to the National Spelling Bee, despite objections from her mother. Drama starring Laurence Fishburne and Angela Bassett

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young man named Tristan tries to win the heart of the beautiful Victoria by venturing into the magical realm to retrieve a fallen star. Adventure starring Michelle Pfeiffer

programme.title: Dean
programme.desc: A comedy about loss, grief and the redemptive power of love. A freelance illustrator in New York suffers a quarter-life crisis and leaves his home for the west coast

programme.title: A Midsummer's Hawaiian Dream
programme.desc: This romantic comedy follows two married anthropology professors and two of their students on a trip to Hawaii, as they attempt to recover an ancient relic from a doomed jungle. Unfortunately, their plans are sent awry when a shaman casts a love spell on them

programme.title: Fluke
programme.desc: Drama. Tom (Matthew Modine), a workaholic, all but ignores his family. Tom's perspective changes when he dies in a car accident and is reincarnated as Fluke, a big brown dog. Fluke attempts to reconnect with his wife and son, but gets lost trying to make his way home

programme.title: Kindergarten Cop
programme.desc: Comedy. Big, brawny cop John Kimble (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must find a drug lord's wife so she can testify in court. Problem is, she's gone into hiding to protect her son. With only the name of the kid's school, Kimble must go undercover, as a kindergarten teacher

programme.title: Monster Trucks
programme.desc: Action with Lucas Till and Jane Levy. Tripp builds a Monster Truck from scrapped cars. After an accident at a nearby oil-drilling site displaces a strange a subterranean creature, he may have just found the key to getting out of town and a most unlikely friend

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Action sci-fi. Several months after the events of Captain America: Civil War, Peter Parker, with the help of his mentor Tony Stark, tries to balance his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens, while fighting a new threat, the Vulture

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: An M. Night Shyamalan thriller. Three friends kidnapped by a ruthless stranger (James McAvoy) soon learn their captor has multiple-personality disorder, forcing them to plot their escape without ever knowing which of his 23 personas they will confront on their way out

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: An M. Night Shyamalan thriller. Three friends kidnapped by a ruthless stranger (James McAvoy) soon learn their captor has multiple-personality disorder, forcing them to plot their escape without ever knowing which of his 23 personas they will confront on their way out

programme.title: The Accused
programme.desc: A rape victim, enraged at the light sentence her attackers received goads a female prosecutor to charge the men who literally cheered the attack on. Drama with Kelly McGillis

programme.title: The Masked Saint
programme.desc: Action starring Brett Granstaff and Lara Jean. A pastor and professional wrestler accepts a position at a struggling church where he helps the community both in his official capacity and as his alter ego The Saint

programme.title: Fluke
programme.desc: Drama. Tom (Matthew Modine), a workaholic, all but ignores his family. Tom's perspective changes when he dies in a car accident and is reincarnated as Fluke, a big brown dog. Fluke attempts to reconnect with his wife and son, but gets lost trying to make his way home

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Action sci-fi. Several months after the events of Captain America: Civil War, Peter Parker, with the help of his mentor Tony Stark, tries to balance his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens, while fighting a new threat, the Vulture

programme.title: Of Mind And Music
programme.desc: In this documentary companion to Charlie's Country, Australian actor David Gulpilil tells the story of when his people's way of life was derailed by ours

programme.title: Paterson
programme.desc: Drama. A week in the life of Paterson (Adam Driver), a city bus driver in Paterson, NJ, as he balances the demands of his working-class job with his passion for poetry and the creative yearnings of his stay-at-home wife Laura

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: A male scientist must become pregnant in order to test a new fertility drug. Comedy starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Danny DeVito

programme.title: Angus Thongs And Perfect Snogging
programme.desc: Comedy starring Eleanor Tomlinson and Georgia Groome. The story centres on a 14-year-old girl who keeps a diary about the ups and downs of being a teenager including the things she learns about kissing

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: Drama with Gillian Anderson. In 1947, Lord Mountbatten assumes the post of last Viceroy, charged with handing India back to its people, living upstairs at the house which was the home of British rulers, whilst 500 Hindu, Muslim and Sikh servants lived downstairs

programme.title: How To Be A Latin Lover
programme.desc: Comedy starring Salma Hayek and Rob Lowe. An aging Latin lover gets dumped by his sugar mama and must fend for himself in a harsh world

programme.title: Get Him To The Greek
programme.desc: Comedy starring Jonah Hill and Russell Brand. A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theatre

programme.title: Get Him To The Greek
programme.desc: Comedy starring Jonah Hill and Russell Brand. A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theatre

programme.title: Lady Macbeth
programme.desc: Drama starring Florence Pugh and Christopher Fairbank. The passionate affair of a young woman trapped in a marriage of convenience unleashes a maelstrom of murder and mayhem on a country estate

programme.title: Where Angels Fear To Tread
programme.desc: Drama, Helena Bonham Carter, Judy Davis. A wealthy Edwardian widow weds a younger Italian man but later dies in childbirth. Her English in-laws arrive to spirit away her son but a principled friend is determined to stop them, setting the stage for unforeseeable tragedy

programme.title: Of Mind And Music
programme.desc: In this documentary companion to Charlie's Country, Australian actor David Gulpilil tells the story of when his people's way of life was derailed by ours

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: Drama with Gillian Anderson. In 1947, Lord Mountbatten assumes the post of last Viceroy, charged with handing India back to its people, living upstairs at the house which was the home of British rulers, whilst 500 Hindu, Muslim and Sikh servants lived downstairs

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: A male scientist must become pregnant in order to test a new fertility drug. Comedy starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Danny DeVito

programme.title: How To Be A Latin Lover
programme.desc: Comedy starring Salma Hayek and Rob Lowe. An aging Latin lover gets dumped by his sugar mama and must fend for himself in a harsh world

programme.title: A Quiet Passion
programme.desc: A biographical drama detailing the life of 19th century American poet Emily Dickinson (Cynthia Nixon), from her early days as a young schoolgirl to her later years as a reclusive, unrecognized artist

programme.title: Judy Moody And The Not Bummer Summer
programme.desc: Family-friendly adventure that finds mischievous third grader Judy Moody experiencing a summer she'll never forget. Jordana Beatty, Heather Graham and Parris Mosteller star

programme.title: Monsters vs. Aliens
programme.desc: Animation. Hit by a meteorite from outer space and turned into a giant monster, a young woman is taken to a secret government compound where she meets a ragtag group of monsters rounded up over the years

programme.title: Sleepless In Seattle
programme.desc: Romantic comedy. Calling in to a radio show, a widowed father (Tom Hanks) becomes an instant hit with thousands of female listeners, including one many miles away (Meg Ryan) who believes it's her destiny to meet him

programme.title: Florence Foster Jenkins
programme.desc: Comedy drama with Meryll Streep and Hugh Grant. The story of Florence Foster Jenkins, a New York heiress, who dreamed of becoming an opera singer, despite having a terrible singing voice

programme.title: Here Comes The Boom
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Kevin James, Salma Hayek, Henry Winkler. A devoted high-school teacher risks life and limb as a mixed-martial-arts fighter in order to raise the $48,000 needed to save the school''s music programme from going belly up

programme.title: Man On Fire
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as a government operative/soldier who has given up on life. In Mexico City, he reluctantly agrees to take a job to protect a child (Fanning) whose parents are threatened by a wave of kidnappings

programme.title: Man On Fire
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as a government operative/soldier who has given up on life. In Mexico City, he reluctantly agrees to take a job to protect a child (Fanning) whose parents are threatened by a wave of kidnappings

programme.title: The Big Short
programme.desc: Docudrama exploring the 2008 financial crisis through the lens of four unorthodox moneymen who foresaw the consequences of the fraudulent mortgage-lending practices of large banks on Wall Street. Christian Bale, Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling star

programme.title: The Student
programme.desc: Drama. Contemporary Russia. A high school student becomes convinced that the world is lost to evil and begins to challenge the morals and beliefs of the adults surrounding him

programme.title: Romancing The Stone
programme.desc: Action adventure Kathleen Turner, Michael Douglas and Danny DeVito. A novelist, aided by a soldier of fortune, gets caught up in a real life South American adventure when forced to find a mysterious treasure in order to rescue her kidnapped sister

programme.title: Labor Day
programme.desc: Drama. An escaped convict (Josh Brolin) manipulates an emotionally single mother (Kate Winslet) into letting him hide out at her house. As police search the town for the escapee, mother and son gradually learn his true story as their options become increasingly limited

programme.title: Nim's Island
programme.desc: Adventure with Abigail Breslin, Gerard Butler and Jodie Foster. A courageous young girl inhabits an exotic island with her father. When he disappears, she turns to the only person who can help her, adventurer Alex Rover, the reclusive author of the novel she's reading

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: The world will never be the same once you've seen it throught he eyes of Forrest Gump starring Tom Hanks. The movie picked up six Academy Awards: including Best Picture, Director, Actor and Adapted Screenplay

programme.title: A Series Of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Family comedy with Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Billy Connolly. Three orphans are left in the care of the peculiar Count Olaf and it doesn't take long for the children to figure out the Count is after their inheritance

programme.title: Charlie St. Cloud
programme.desc: A young man forms a unique connection to the afterlife after surviving the tragic car accident that claimed his younger brother in this heartfelt and powerful supernatural drama. Zac Efron and Amanda Crew star

programme.title: Time Trap
programme.desc: Action. A group of students become trapped inside a mysterious cave where they discover time passes differently underground than on the surface

programme.title: Killer App
programme.desc: Thriller. A young hacker creates an "antisocial" networking app that matches enemies instead of friends - but when her enemies start turning up dead, she must uncover who or what is behind the mysterious deaths before it's too late

programme.desc: A nurse takes a job as a live-in nurse at a run-down mansion, she begins to explore the house using a skeleton key that unlocks every door and uncovers a terrible secret in the attic. Kate Hudson and John Hurt star

programme.desc: Drama. At the end of his marriage, David goes on a business trip to give his wife some space; however, when airplanes start mysteriously falling out of the sky and phone masts fail across the nation, David finds himself trapped during an alien invasion

programme.desc: Thriller. A cat and mouse game pits one of the FBI's best profilers against a new kind of serial killer while law enforcement races against time

programme.desc: Horror. Determined to finish off the infamous killer once and for all, Tommy and a friend dig up Jason Voorhees’ corpse in order to cremate him. Unfortunately, things go badly wrong and Jason is instead resurrected, sparking a new chain of brutal murders

programme.desc: Action comedy. After two years in prison for participating in an illegal street race, Roy says no to a new illegal winter race from Bergen to Murmansk in the North of Russia. But then he hears that his daughter will participate with a boyfriend

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Harrison Ford stars in this story based on Tom Clancy's bestseller. Jack Ryan becomes the target for an Irish terrorist bent on revenge after the killing of his comrades. Sean Bean and James Earl Jones co-star

programme.title: Phoenix Forgotten
programme.desc: Horror. 20 years after three teenagers disappeared in the wake of mysterious lights appearing above Phoenix, Arizona, unseen footage from that night has been discovered, chronicling the final hours of their fateful expedition

programme.title: Dark Meridian
programme.desc: Crime and thriller. A corrupt New Orleans detective gets caught up in a fight between two criminal gangs while on a stake out. To survive the night, he must find a killer on the run and take him out before the killer reaches his other targets

programme.title: Virtual Revolution
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller. In 2047, people spend all of their time inside virtual worlds. When terrorists threaten the virtual world, a hybrid seeking revenge is hired to eliminate them before they can take down the system

programme.title: Housebound
programme.desc: Comedy. When Kylie Bucknell (Morgana O'Reilly) is sentenced to home detention, she's forced to come to terms with her unsociable behaviour, her blabbering mother (Rima Te Wiata) and a hostile spirit who seems less than happy about the new living arrangement

programme.title: The Curse Of Sleeping Beauty
programme.desc: Fantasy thriller, Ethan Peck, India Eisley, Natalie Hall. After inheriting a mansion that's been in his family for centuries, Thomas Kaiser must battle demons and an ancient curse as he attempts to rescue a beautiful woman from a dreamlike world

programme.title: Funny Little Cars
programme.desc: Animation. Citizens of Doom Valley are not human beings but cars, trucks, boats, and scooters with strong human characteristics. Doom Valley is being destroyed by criminals and environmentally unsound businesses. Its up to the few residents left in town to fight back

programme.title: Shopkins - World Vacation
programme.desc: Animation. Kooky Cookie gets caught up in a diamond heist while the Shoppies are on holiday, so they head out on a worldwide tour to try and clear her name

programme.title: The Emperor's Secret
programme.desc: Animation. Familiar characters from a Finnish TV show star in this fairy tale where the inhabitants of a small village have to defend themselves against a despotic emperor

programme.desc: Animation. Ploddy the Police car is assigned to guard an endangered eagle mother and her egg. However, when thieves steal the mother, Ploddy ends up hatching the egg under his hood and gets a lot busier than planned

programme.title: Dinofroz Return To The Past World
programme.desc: Animation. The series depicts the adventures of Tom, a 12-year-old boy and his friends who, after playing a board game, are transported to a world where they can transform into dinosaurs using stones called Rockfroz

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: Adventure with Johnny Depp. Captain Jack Sparrow is pursued by an old rival, Captain Salazar, who along with his crew of ghost pirates has escaped from the Devil's Triangle, and is determined to kill every pirate at sea

programme.title: Saving Mr. Banks
programme.desc: Biographical comedy telling the story of how Walt Disney (Tom Hanks) courted author P.L. Travers (Emma Thompson) into letting him option the rights to Mary Poppins, and how he realised that a sensitive chapter from Travers' youth could be the key to clinching the deal

programme.title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Anne Hathaway, Julie Andrews. The unlikely princess finds herself with a daunting prospect. In addition to further schooling on the etiquette of royalty, according to Genovian law, all princesses must be married before they can be crowned queen

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Springtime With Roo
programme.desc: Animation. It's Easter and the whole gang is excited because that means Rabbit will be playing the Easter Bunny, and yet Rabbit isn't interested in partaking in any festivities and would rather spend the day spring cleaning. Roo has an idea that just might save the day

programme.title: Tinker Bell
programme.desc: Animation. Tinker Bell thinks her fairy talent isn't as special as the other fairies' but when Tink tries to change who she is, she creates nothing but disaster! With encouragement from her friends, Tink learns that when she's true to herself, magical things can happen

programme.desc: Family comedy. When an evil oil man (Chris Cooper) discovers black gold beneath Muppet Theatre, Kermit recruits a Muppet super-fan and his two best friends (Jason Segel, Amy Adams) to prevent the beloved venue from being razed

programme.title: The Mighty Ducks
programme.desc: Family comedy. A trial lawyer is slapped with a community service assignment to coach a ragtag team of peewee hockey players. Armed with the attitude that there are more important things than winning, feathers fly as they battle along to the biggest game of their lives!

programme.desc: A special event featuring star-studded musical performances, moving tributes and never-before-seen short films. Superstars from music, film and television join the festivities to celebrate and honour 90 years of the internationally beloved character

programme.title: Kronk's New Groove
programme.desc: Family animation. Kronk is fretting over the upcoming visit of his father. His father always disapproved of young Kronk's culinary interests and wished instead that he would settle down with a wife and a large house on a hill

programme.title: Bedtime Stories
programme.desc: Family comedy starring Adam Sandler as a hotel handyman whose life changes when the lavish bedtime stories he tells his niece and nephew start to magically come true

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: Romantic comedy. Recently separated from her husband, Alice Kinney (Reese Witherspoon) moves back home to Los Angeles. As Alice develops a romance with a much younger filmmaker, her newfound happiness comes crashing down when her ex-husband (Michael Sheen) shows up

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: Comedy. Sonny (Adam Sandler) has spent his whole life avoiding responsibility but when his girlfriend dumps him for an older man, he's got to find a way to prove he's ready to grow up. In a desperate last-ditch effort, Sonny adopts a 5-year-old kid to impress her

programme.title: Confessions Of A Shopaholic
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Isla Fisher. A college graduate lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City where she nurtures her addiction to shopping and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur

programme.title: Angels In The Snow
programme.desc: Family comedy. A bickering couple (Kristy Swanson, Chris Potter) learn a valuable lesson when a blizzard forces them to spend Christmas with a loving family

programme.title: Drillbit Taylor
programme.desc: Three kids hire a low-budget bodyguard to protect them from a playground bully. Family comedy starring Owen Wilson and Alex Frost

programme.title: The Butcher's Wife
programme.desc: A clairvoyant woman (Demi Moore) is able to help folk in her neighbourhood but fails to predict that her butcher husband will fall in love with another woman. This comic fantasy charts the various romantic detours and conflicts that result from her paranormal meddling

programme.title: Employee Of The Month
programme.desc: A couple of employees at a superstore compete for the affections of a new co-worker by trying to win the Employee of the Month award. Comedy starring Jessica Simpson

programme.title: Eurotrip
programme.desc: Dumped by his girlfriend, a high school graduate decides to embark on an overseas adventure in Europe with his friends. Comedy with Scott Mechlowicz and Jacob Pitts

programme.title: Johnny Be Good

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: Comedy drama, Danny Glover, Kimberly Elise. Walter asks his family to join him for their first Christmas since his wife passed away. If his bickering children and the rest of the family can spend 5 days together under the same roof, it will truly be a Christmas miracle

programme.title: Heartbeats
programme.desc: Romantic drama. The story of a high spirited American hip-hop dancer who travels to India with her family for a wedding and falls in love, with both the new style of dance and the determined young man who introduces it to her

programme.title: Ghost Team
programme.desc: Comedy starring Justin Long and Jon Heder. A paranormal-obsessed man mounts his own investigation into the beyond with his depressed best friend, misfit nephew, a cable access medium and an overeager security guard

programme.title: Mr. Wonderful
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Matt Dillion, Annabella Sciorra, Mary-Louise Parker. Too strapped to go in on a bowling-alley investment with friends, electrician Gus tries to end the alimony payments which keep him in debt by arranging a marriage for his ex-wife

programme.title: Bad Santa 2
programme.desc: Comedy. Fueled by cheap whisky, greed and hatred, Willie Soke (Billy Bob Thornton) teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus (Tony Cox), to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve

programme.desc: Comedy with Adam Sandler, Katie Holmes & Al Pacino. Jack always dreads Thanksgiving holiday because for him it means only one thing, a visit from his needy, passive-aggressive twin sister Jill (also played by Sandler)

programme.desc: Leslie Nielsen returns as the bumbling Frank Drebin of the Police Squad, this time trying to thwart an evil conglomerate of energy corporations from kidnapping an environmentalist. Comedy with Priscilla Presley

programme.desc: Family adventure with Ripley Sobo and Susan Sarandon. While her mother is away on business, a young girl home alone with her older brother witnesses her neighbor's kidnapping. But no one believes her. So she takes matters into her own hands to save her neighbour

programme.desc: Family comedy. Animals are strictly forbidden at Andi and Bruce's foster home but for Friday, the adorable dog they secretly care for and all the other neighbourhood strays they find, they're ready to risk everything

programme.desc: Animated family movie with the voices of David Schwimmer, Ben Stiller and Chris Rock. On route from Madagascar to New York via a penguin-piloted plane the four animal friends crash-land in the plains of Africa

programme.desc: Drama. Reality TV star Ann Stanway (Danielle C. Ryan) leaves Hollywood and finds herself in an Amish country where she discovers friendship, new love and ultimately herself. She must decide between staying in her newfound reality or returning to her old one

programme.title: Breaking Brooklyn
programme.desc: Drama. A 12-year-old boy with a passion for dance and his brother are rescued from the streets by an old showman who takes them to live with his former dance partner

programme.desc: Biographical drama. After leaving London for the English countryside, writer A.A. Milne starts to spin fanciful yarns about his son's growing collection of stuffed animals. These stories form the basis for "Winnie-the-Pooh" published in 1926

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: When an attack on the Kingsman headquarters takes place and a new villain rises, Eggsy and Merlin are forced to work together with the American agency known as the Statesman to save the world

programme.desc: Drama. Reality TV star Ann Stanway (Danielle C. Ryan) leaves Hollywood and finds herself in an Amish country where she discovers friendship, new love and ultimately herself. She must decide between staying in her newfound reality or returning to her old one

programme.title: Breaking Brooklyn
programme.desc: Drama. A 12-year-old boy with a passion for dance and his brother are rescued from the streets by an old showman who takes them to live with his former dance partner

programme.title: Goodbye Christopher Robin
programme.desc: Biographical drama. After leaving London for the English countryside, writer A.A. Milne starts to spin fanciful yarns about his son's growing collection of stuffed animals. These stories form the basis for "Winnie-the-Pooh" published in 1926

programme.title: Incredibles 2
programme.desc: Animation. Everyone's favourite family of superheroes is back. This time Elastigirl (Holly Hunter) is in the spotlight, leaving Mr. Incredible (Craig T. Nelson) at home with Violet and Dash. It's a tough transition, made tougher as baby Jack-Jack's superpowers emerge

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: When an attack on the Kingsman headquarters takes place and a new villain rises, Eggsy and Merlin are forced to work together with the American agency known as the Statesman to save the world

programme.title: The Tale
programme.desc: Drama with Laura Dern. An investigation into one woman's memory as she is forced to re-examine her first sexual relationship and the stories we tell ourselves in order to survive

programme.title: Cover Versions
programme.desc: Thriller starring Katie Cassidy and Drake Bell. On the eve of their biggest gig ever, the members of synth-rock band Starfoxy throw a rager that ends with a fan mysteriously dead in the pool

programme.title: Runaway Romance
programme.desc: Drama. Reality TV star Ann Stanway (Danielle C. Ryan) leaves Hollywood and finds herself in an Amish country where she discovers friendship, new love and ultimately herself. She must decide between staying in her newfound reality or returning to her old one

programme.title: Breaking Brooklyn
programme.desc: Drama. A 12-year-old boy with a passion for dance and his brother are rescued from the streets by an old showman who takes them to live with his former dance partner

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Dearly Depotted
programme.desc: Crime drama. Abby Knight, ex-lawyer, crime buff and owner of Bloomers Flower Shop, is having a week to be reckoned with. A reluctant bridesmaid at a wedding, Abby ends up not just doing the flowers, but having to find out who murdered a wedding crasher

programme.title: Goodbye Christopher Robin
programme.desc: Biographical drama. After leaving London for the English countryside, writer A.A. Milne starts to spin fanciful yarns about his son's growing collection of stuffed animals. These stories form the basis for "Winnie-the-Pooh" published in 1926

programme.title: The Breadwinner
programme.desc: This animated feature set in Kabul follows a young girl named Parvana who must cut off her hair and disguise herself as a boy to become the breadwinner for her family when her father is imprisoned

programme.title: Incredibles 2
programme.desc: Animation. Everyone's favourite family of superheroes is back. This time Elastigirl (Holly Hunter) is in the spotlight, leaving Mr. Incredible (Craig T. Nelson) at home with Violet and Dash. It's a tough transition, made tougher as baby Jack-Jack's superpowers emerge

programme.title: Shopkins - World Vacation
programme.desc: Animation. Kooky Cookie gets caught up in a diamond heist while the Shoppies are on holiday, so they head out on a worldwide tour to try and clear her name

programme.title: We Love You, Sally Carmichael
programme.desc: Comedy. Simon Hayes, an author, is ashamed to have written a series of romance novels under the pen name, Sally Carmichael. When Simon is forced to meet a top box office star, his carefully built life of anonymity starts crumbling down around him

programme.title: Marshall
programme.desc: This biographical drama, starring Chadwick Boseman and Kate Hudson, follows a young Thurgood Marshall, the first African-American Supreme Court Justice, as he battles through one of his career-defining cases

programme.title: Kodachrome
programme.desc: Drama based on A.G. Sulzberger's 2010 New York Times article about a father (Ed Harris) and son (Jason Sudeikis) who take a road trip to Kansas in order to to develop photographs at Kodak's last Kodachrome lab before it closes its doors forever

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: Sci-fi action. The fate of the galaxy rests in the hands of an Iowa farm boy (Chris Pine) and a Vulcan (Zachary Quinto). As fiery instinct clashes with calm reason, their unlikely but powerful partnership is the only thing capable of leading their crew through danger

programme.title: City Island
programme.desc: Prison guard Vince Rizzo (Andy Garcia) wants to quit his job to become an actor, but he needs to make up time with his long lost son Tony, who's an inmate. When Tony is freed, he moves in with Vince and his family, which leads to a series of comic misunderstandings

programme.title: Fort Bliss
programme.desc: Drama, Michelle Monaghan, Ron Livingston, Manolo Cardona. A decorated U.S. Army medic discovers her relationship with her young son may be damaged beyond repair upon returning from a long tour of duty in Afghanistan and attempting to resume duties as a single mother

programme.title: Amelie
programme.desc: Bursting with imagination and having seen her share of tragedy and fantasy, Amelie is not like the other girls. Romance with Audrey Tautou and Mathieu Kassovitz

programme.title: Snowden
programme.desc: Biographical drama. The NSA's illegal surveillance techniques are leaked to the public by one of the agency's employees, Edward Snowden, in the form of thousands of classified documents distributed to the press

programme.title: The Yards
programme.desc: Thriller with James Caan and Mark Wahlberg. With the help of his uncle, an ex-con trying to go straight gets a job in the rail yard. Soon enough though he realises his uncle has his fingers in some very hot pies

programme.title: Touchy Feely
programme.desc: A dentist (Josh Pais) gains the ability to heal his patients' physical pain while his sister (Rosemarie DeWitt), a massage therapist, develops an aversion to touching and being touched

programme.title: The Dressmaker
programme.desc: STAR Movies offers an exciting and unique mix of the best films from around the world

programme.title: Miss You Already
programme.desc: Comedy drama chronicling the relationship of lifelong friends, Jess (Drew Barrymore) and Milly (Toni Collette). Complications arise when one starts a family and the other falls ill, testing the friendship as they attempt to deal with the joy and sorrow in their lives

programme.title: A Dangerous Method
programme.desc: Drama detailing the failing relationship of Sigmund Freud (Viggo Mortensen) and disciple Carl Jung (Michael Fassbender), and the Freudian techniques used to treat psychiatric patient Sabina Spielrein (Keira Knightley)

programme.title: Hatha Al Masaa'

programme.title: Mrs. Harris

programme.desc: Two-part miniseries with an all-star cast telling the humorous, poignant story of a declining New England town and its inhabitants whose lives are deeply rooted in, and influenced by, the Knox River and its vacant mills, their class differences, and ghosts of the past

programme.desc: Two-part miniseries with an all-star cast telling the humorous, poignant story of a declining New England town and its inhabitants whose lives are deeply rooted in, and influenced by, the Knox River and its vacant mills, their class differences, and ghosts of the past

programme.title: RKO 281

programme.title: On Freddie Roach
programme.desc: Series chronicling the daily activities of celebrated boxing trainer & International Hall of Fame inductee Freddie Roach as he works with elite fighters at his Wild Card Boxing Club, Hollywood, CA, all while fighting an ailment very likely linked to his own boxing past

programme.title: Sometimes In April
programme.desc: Based on actual events that occurred during the 1994 uprising in Rwanda, this drama tells the tale of two brothers whose differing loyalties found them on opposing sides of the conflict, and whose lives would never be the same following this tragic turn of events

programme.title: From The Earth To The Moon
programme.desc: NASA takes its boldest and most controversial step - an attempt to fly men around the moon and back for the first time in history - at the end of one of the most cataclysmic years of the century

programme.title: Lucky Louie
programme.desc: Concerned about Louie's bad eating habits, Kim puts him on a healthy diet that only aggravates the problem

programme.title: Animals.
programme.desc: The heroic saga of a small, but fiercely heroic bird, Wallet, who leaves his home after tragedy strikes, makes his way to Pigeon Heights where he becomes the right-hand man to recently crowned Pigeon King Phil, and is tasked with saving the day when terrorists strike

programme.title: Wyatt Cenac's Problem Areas
programme.desc: Wyatt talks banking deserts, explores the unintended consequences of combating mosquitos, and examines the intersection of America's mental health crisis and policing

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: The acclaimed series returns for a sixth season, providing the Emmy-winning comedian/actor/writer John Oliver a unique platform to offer up his deeply funny and profoundly necessary perspective on any number of social, political or existential issues

programme.title: Deadly Class
programme.desc: Following the death of Chico and Yukio, a gang war brews during a lockdown imposed by Lin

programme.title: Mr. Inbetween
programme.desc: People are not always what they appear to be and a good strong name is important. It's also important to lock your car when you leave it

programme.title: Mr. Inbetween
programme.desc: A nutritious breakfast is the key to good health. As is looking in the trunk before you steal a car. People say they do but does anybody really like surprises?

programme.title: 7 Days In Hell
programme.desc: This comedy special brings Andy Samberg and Kit Harington together for a hilarious, star-studded spoof of big-time tennis. It takes an irreverent, mock-serious look back at a pair of fictional players from the past, who played a seven-day, five-set Wimbledon marathon

programme.title: High Maintenance
programme.desc: An acting teacher named Leonard contemplates a move back to New York. The Guy connects with old high-school friends Sarah and Brian who are visiting the city under difficult circumstances

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Nora awakens to find Kevin missing and her hopes of safety in their new town dashed. The Murphys are left reeling after Evie's disappearance. Kevin returns home but without his memory of the night before or his cell phone, which would link him to the missing girls

programme.title: Carnivale
programme.desc: Justin is pushed by Dolan to make a difficult decision. Iris gives an important dictation. Ben has a nightmare visit with a mask-maker. Ruthie shares her visions with Sofie, who decides to help Ben. Rita Sue is generous with Stumpy, who bets on a big fight

programme.title: The Pentagon Wars
programme.desc: Sharp, satirical account of an Air Force colonel who, so shocked at government spending, decides to launch a personal investigation. When a certain General finds out about the inquiry, he does everything he can to stop him. Kelsey Grammer, Cary Elwes, Olympia Dukakis

programme.title: RKO 281
programme.desc: Biopic. When Orson Welles (Liev Schreiber) announced that he intended to make the film Citizen Kane based on the life of tyrannical multi-millionaire publisher William Randolph Hearst (James Cromwell), what he didn't count on was the power of Hearst to stop production

programme.title: Conspiracy
programme.desc: Historical drama based on the transcripts (and filmed in real-time) from the 1942 Wannsee Conference where, over the space of 2 hours, Reinhard Heinrich (Kenneth Branagh) met a group of high-ranking Nazi officials to discuss the final solution to 'The Jewish Question'

programme.title: You Don't Know Jack
programme.desc: Biopic tracing the controversial career of the outspoken assisted suicide advocate/activist Dr. Jack Kevorkian (Al Pacino). When Kevorkian is forced to defend his philosophy and practices in court, a media firestorm erupts over a patient's right to die

programme.title: From The Earth To The Moon
programme.desc: Engineers at Grumman Aviation work with NASA and the Apollo 9 astronauts to design, build, and finally test-fly the world's first true space ship - a "lunar module" which will hopefully land the first humans on the moon

programme.title: Lucky Louie
programme.desc: With Lucy away, Louie thinks he's in for a weekend of sex with Kim, but a gifting memory lapse derails his plans

programme.title: Animals.
programme.desc: In the new classist society that's been established among the equine community, a rich horse's daughter finds herself in a love triangle with a suitor approved by her father and a carriage horse from the wrong side of the tracks

programme.title: Midnight, Texas
programme.desc: Fiji and Manfred try to get to the bottom of who or what is trying to kill Bobo. A guilt-ridden Rev struggles with the weight of his past. Joe embraces his new 'night job', unbeknownst to his husband

programme.title: Preacher
programme.desc: While Jesse, Tulip, Gran'ma and Starr form an uneasy partnership to avert the apocalypse, Cassidy learns to love Eccarius ... but at a cost

programme.title: Strike Back
programme.desc: Coltrane defends his decision to go rogue with S20. After tailing Hassan and the nuclear suitcase to a deserted shopping mall in Jakarta, Wyatt and Novin face down threats from Komodo soldiers and, later, Colonel Aldo and his insurgents

programme.title: Five Days
programme.desc: Barclay has turned Leanne's disappearance into a murder investigation and Kyle Betts is the prime suspect. Matt, monitored by a marine buddy who's agreed to be an informant, discovers Leanne bought a one-way flight to France a matter of days before her disappearance

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: Rev. Jamison takes his wife Mary outside Miracle to seek answers about her condition, but their lives take a dangerous detour when he's barred from returning. Racing to get her back into Miracle, he struggles to keep Mary safe from tourists squatting outside the town

programme.title: Carnivale
programme.desc: The troupe breaks bread with another carnival and Samson makes a deal with an old friend named Sabina. Iris and Justin prepare for their most difficult sermon yet. Stumpy panics as Rita Sue goes on a charity mission. Jones and Stumpy both try to defend Libby's honour

programme.title: Buried: Knights Templar Revealed
programme.desc: The team turn their attention to the Templars' moment of reckoning: the fall of the order in 1307. Coded Templar symbols lead them to a mysterious monastery in Spain that may hold clues to the knights' ultimate survival as a secret organisation

programme.title: Detroit Steel
programme.desc: Adam finds the perfect car for his client – a 1956 Chevrolet Bel Air station wagon. Meanwhile, Mobsteel prepares for the grand opening of their downtown Detroit shop

programme.title: Swamp People
programme.desc: Facing the prospect of shutting down early this year, Troy promotes Chase to captain of his own boat. Daniel Edgar calls in his son to help fill tags. RJ and Jay Paul hunt on separate boats for the first time ever

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Build an empire with the Pawn Stars when a letter signed by Napoleon marches in. Will Rick make it a short sale or will his offer be defeated? When a surreal Pedro Friedeberg figure creeps in, will Rick sculpt a deal or will the design disappoint?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Assemble the troops with the Pawn Stars when two rare G.I. Joe playsets lay siege to the shop. Will Rick make the deal his mission or will his offer be discharged?

programme.title: American Pickers Best Ofs
programme.desc: Series following two of America's most skilled 'pickers' as they scour junk piles, garages, attics and barns for hidden gems and objects with historical and collectible value

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The girls have a newlywed-themed surprise for Emily. Rene reels in a huge locker, while Darrell tests his bicycle knowledge... and wins

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The oldest facility in Los Angeles is where the newest buyers make their debut. Brandi and Jarrod try to piece their way to a win, while Ivy manages to hoard most of the units for himself

programme.title: Counting Cars
programme.desc: Guitarist DJ Ashba stops by the shop to have Danny work on his 100-year-old Model-T rat rod. Then, the Count's Kustoms crew are commissioned to build a 21st century version of the iconic General Lee Dodge Charger from the "Dukes of Hazzard" TV show

programme.title: Road Hauks
programme.desc: A local distillery has enlisted Kenny and the crew to create a modern Bootlegger by combining a copper still and a 2010 Camaro. It's one of the biggest challenges they've attempted, and finishing in time and under budget will push them to the limits

programme.title: Cities Of The Underworld
programme.desc: Host Don Wildman explores a subterranean web of tunnels on Belgium's Western Front, where 24,000 Allied soldiers saw service during World War I

programme.title: Ancient Impossible
programme.desc: Power tools are not from the modern world, but are in fact thousands of years old. Most would be lost to time and not again for centuries. How was the ancient world able to create such incredible power tools?

programme.title: Evolve
programme.desc: A look at sex in its many forms and exploring how it could evolve in the future. Are we moving beyond sex? Is a time coming when we will be able to seize control of our own evolution through genetic engineering?

programme.title: Clash Of The Gods
programme.desc: The myth of ancient Greece's most feared god, and the mortals who tried to cross his path. A chilling collection of tales about Hades and the underworld bearing his name, with eerie links to real world curses, ghosts and secret cults

programme.title: Breaking Mysterious
programme.desc: A mysterious email leads to what could be a huge underwater UFO base off the California coast. An investigation of new activity at Area 51 takes a dangerous turn. Plus, could an alien satellite be orbiting the Earth right now?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Investigating the theory that an ice-free Antarctica may have been colonised by extraterrestrials in the remote past, before a global catastrophe plunged it into an ice age

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: As science turns towards augmenting humanity with technology, theorists suggest that we are merely following the path of our alien creators

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Ancient astronaut theorists look at the Aborigine mythos of Dreamtime, and ask if these stories hold the proof that aliens created life on Earth

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: Conor McGregor, one of the most charismatic fighters in a generation, and UFC legend Uriah Faber, are the rival coaches in a special Team Europe vs Team USA season of "The Ultimate Fighter"

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: Both coaches meet their respective teams and offer advice to the fighters, all hopeful of winning the series and earning a UFC contract in the process

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: UFC President Dana White explains McGregor's approach to training while Team Faber gather to watch TJ Dillashaw's defence of his UFC Bantamweight Championship against Renan Barao

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: Faber and McGregor exchange heated words about the Irishman's post-fight reactions, while a fighter elects to skip a training session prompting a frustrated outburst from his coach

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: Tensions rise in the house, with several fighters reflecting on their careers and the pressure of living among competition. Englishman Saul Rogers takes on Billy Quarantillo in the featured bout

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: McGregor, Faber and Cody Garbrandt get into a heated, then physical exchange when 'The Notorious' criticizes TJ Dillashaw and predicts an impending seperation from Team Alpha Male

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: A druken confrontation shocks the house. In an attempt to boost his team's spirit, Uriah Faber takes his fighters to a thrift store to buy outfits and mock McGregor's outlandish fancy threads. Martin Svensson fights Thanh Le in the featured bout

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: Straight Blast Gym's Artem Lobov faces James Jenkins and David Teymur takes on Johnny Nunez as the competition for a $250,000 prize and a UFC contract heats up

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: The coaches' challenge see McGregor and Faber compete in a target game throwing watermelons from a helicopter. The quarter-final match-ups are announced

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: UFC President Dana White throws a pool party for the TUF house, giving the fighters a chance to let their hair down and enjoy a reward for putting on an exciting season of fights

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: Artem Lobov calls out Julian Erosa, asking UFC President Dana White to make sure the two men face each other in the semi-finals of the competition

programme.title: Tuf: Team McGregor v Team Faber
programme.desc: UFC Featherweight Champion Jose Aldo visits the TUF gym only to be met by a staredown with upcoming opponent Conor McGregor. Saul Rogers faces Marcin Wrzosek and Artem Lobov fights Julian Erosa in the semi-finals of the competition

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: Two best friends and CIA agents, Tuck a divorced guy and Frank, a ladies man. They discover falling in love with the same girl "Lauren". She is confused between both of them. Both men agree to let her choose. But they just can't stop using their skills to keep tabs on her

programme.title: Maggie
programme.desc: A loving father stays by his daughter's side after she gets infected with a recently out-broken disease that turns the infected into cannibalistic zombies

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: This title is a an action-comedy crime picture that brings together two seemingly disparate talents: Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg. Dwayne Johnson, Michael Keaton and Samuel L. Jackson also assume roles as part of this production’s star studded cast. Detectives Allen Gamble (Will Ferrell) and Terry Hoitz (Mark Wahlberg) are the laughing stock of the police department. Gamble’s fumbling nature and Hoitz’s tendency to fire off his gun when it is least appropriate have guaranteed the pair desk jobs as long as there is any excuse to keep them off the street. However, when the department’s two leading detectives lose their lives in an unglamorous, nay, silly accident Gamble and Hoitz are given a chance to step up. Will Hoitz’s gung-ho nature and Gamble’s nerd-like demeanor somehow provide the magic recipe for forensic success? Or will the two manage to screw things up once again – thereby earning another several decades in the police department filing room

programme.title: The Proposal
programme.desc: This production is a romantic comedy that was directed by Anne Fletcher. The film stars Sandra Bullock and Ryan Reynolds. Margaret Tate (Sandra Bullock) is the executive editor in chief of Ruick & Hunt Publishing. Her iron-fist management style has made her very unpopular among her employees who resent her bossy ways. To her horror, Margaret learns that she is being deported to Canada as her visa has expired. In order to avert a forced deportation, Margaret forces her assistance Andrew Paxton (Ryan Reynolds) to marry her. Although Andrew is a bit hesitant at first, he agrees after Margaret convinces him that if she is deported the new boss that would replace her will fire him straight away. The pair make their way to the Immigration Department where they meet immigration officer Mr. Gilbertson (Denis O’Hare). There they learn that a tip-off by one of Margaret’s former employees has led the department to suspect that their marital arrangements are fraudulent and are intended to avert Margaret’s deportation. They also learn that in order to verify the supposed marital process, the department will ask each of them questions separately in addition to interviewing their families. If they fail the interview process, Margaret will be deported and Andrew will be convicted of a felony with a $ 250,000 fine and a year in prison. Andrew has second thoughts about the arrangement after learning what it could cost him and thus he confronts Margaret and tells her he will continue the charade on the condition that she promotes him to editor and publishes his book. After seeing that he is adamant about his request, Margaret has no choice but to agree

programme.title: Foxcatcher
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography of Olympic wrestling champion Mark Schultz, the film depicts how Schultz and his brother (and fellow wrestling champ) Dave befriended paranoid schizophrenic multimillionaire, naturalist and sports patron John du Pont, and how their relationship had fatal consequences to Schultz

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: After a failed attempt to slow down global warming, an ice age starts and destroys life on planet earth, sparing the lives of a few survivors who take refuge in a giant snow-piercing train. The elite live in the front of the train, while the poor inhabit the tail. After 17 years, the poor start an uprising led by Curtis (Chris Evans), and manage to free a prisoner Namgoong (Kang-ho Song), the man who built the doors dividing each car, and his daughter Yona. They offer him Kronol, an addictive drug, as payment for unlocking the doors, and continue their class-based revolution

programme.desc: A seventh installment to the series, with events taking place thirty years after the Battle of Endor and the events portrayed in Return of the Jedi

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: An apocalyptic, endless winter forces humanity to take cover and try to survive in a number of underground outposts. programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family
programme.desc: Madea jumps into action when her niece, Shirley, receives distressing news about her health. All Shirley wants is to gather her three adult children around her and share the news as a family. But Tammy, Kimberly and Byron are too distracted by their own problems: Tammy can't manage her unruly children or her broken marriage; Kimberly is gripped with anger and takes it out on her husband; and Byron, after spending two years in jail, is under pressure to deal drugs again. It's up to Madea, with the help of the equally rambunctious Aunt Bam, to gather the clan together and make things right the only way she knows how

The Karate Kid
programme.desc: This picture is a remake of the 1984 martial arts classic of the same name. The film was directed by Harald Zwart and stars Jackie Chan, Jaden Smith and Taraji P. Henson. Dre Parker (Jaden Smith) is a young boy who has just moved to Beijing with his mother (Taraji P. Henson). Soon after settling in, Dre develops a crush on a young violinist. However, his attempts to get to know her are blocked by Cheng, a “kung fu kid” who has a good time beating Dre to the ground. At this point Mr. Han (Jackie Chan) comes to Dre’s aid and begins teaching him the kung fu skills he will need to turn back his adversaries

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: This title is a comedy based on the pop fiction franchise. Acclaimed French director Michel Gondry directs the work which features the talents of Seth Rogen, Cameron Diaz, Jay Chou and “Inglorious Basterds” star Christopher Waltz among others. Britt Reid is the under-achieving son of an LA media magnate. The unanticipated death of his father kick-starts his life as he decides to use resources inherited from his father to fight city crime. In his efforts to fight crime Reid recruits the help of his father’s mechanic and a criminologist. In-fighting and disputes threaten the crime-fighting trio before they have a chance to make a difference. Can the team get their act together in time to make a difference

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Desmond T.Doss chooses to enlist in the American Army during WWII as a medic and is sent to the Pacific to participate in the Battle of Okinawa against Japanese forces. Due to his religious beliefs, he refuses to carry arms and spends his time saving soldiers (Americans and Japanese) instead of fighting in a gruesome battlefield. Doss becomes the first Conscientious Objector in American history to be awarded the Medal of Honor

programme.desc: The movie revolves about the story of J. Edgar Hoover, the face of law enforcement in America for 9 American presidents. He used his power and authority to humiliate the most powerful and rich men. Behind the closed doors there are always secrets that would destroy life

programme.title: Cafe Society
programme.desc: A romantic, drama story, about "Bobby" who arrives from Bronx , New York to Hollywood during the thirties, hoping to work in the film industry, there he falls in love with his uncle secretary, who happened to be loved by his uncle as well, confused between both of them, she chose his uncle over "Bobby" and they go separate ways, however, soon he returned back to New York to work with his brother in the management of a nightclub, but the story does not end at this point

programme.title: Prisoners
programme.desc: When Keller Dover's (Hugh Jackman) daughter and her boyfriend go missing, the police start searching for leads to find her, but when they fail due to lack of evidence, Dover takes matters into his own hands

programme.title: Here Alone
programme.desc: A young woman struggles to survive on her own in the wake of a mysterious epidemic that has killed most of her society, and forced her deep into the unforgiving wilderness

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: The Zookeerper's Wife tells the story of Antonina and Jan Zabinski, keepers of the Warsaw Zoo, who helped save hundreds of people and animals during the Nazi invasion in WWII

programme.title: Due Date
programme.desc: Peter Highman (Robert Downey Jr.) is expecting the birth of his first baby in 5 days. On his way home from Atlanta, he loses his wallet and therefore is not allowed to board the plane. In order not to miss the birth of his son, he must accept a ride cross country with Ethan Tremblay (Zach Galifianakis). Chaos ensues as the two men with nothing in common drive each other crazy

programme.title: The Year Without a Santa Claus
Winx Club : Magic Adventure
programme.desc: From the magical world of the Winx Club based on the Italian TV series comes Bloom, who is happily living with her parents in Domino as Princess of the Realm. When her boyfriend Sky asks for her hand in marriage, life couldn't be sweeter. Her world is threatened when Sky's father forbids their marriage and unveils a terrible secret he has long kept. Bloom must call upon her trusty Winx Club gal pals to overcome the odds ahead of her and the entire Magic Kingdom

programme.title: Elliot the Littlest Reindeer
programme.desc: When a reindeer announces his retirement on December 21st, a small horse has 3 days to fulfill his lifelong dream of earning a spot on Santa's team at the North Pole try-outs

programme.desc: A young boy encounters a magical garden that enables him to travel through time and meet his relatives from different eras, with the help of his younger sister from the future
